name: claude-code-tests

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:mocked
scripts.test:all: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:security && npm run test:performance && npm run test:chaos
